languages.text: This creature gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +3 deflection for each stack of the effect.
languages.original_text: В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} это существо получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}, равный числу существ, на которых действует эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}. Также это существо восстанавливает +10% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} за каждое существо с эффектом кровотечения.

traits.locale_text: At the beginning of each turn this creature gains a bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} equal to the number of creatures suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect} effect{/g}. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum wounds per number of creatures suffering from bleeding.

At the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the number of creatures suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of creatures suffering from bleeding.

languages.text: Это существо получает +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} за каждый уровень эффекта.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the number of creatures suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of creatures suffering from bleeding.

languages.text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，此生物获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，等同于受到流血效果影响的生物数量。此外，每有一名生物处于{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}状态{/g}，此生物恢复10%的最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the number of creatures suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of creatures suffering from bleeding.

traits.locale_text: 每回合开始时，此生物获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}加值，等同于受到{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}效果{/g}影响的生物数量。此外，每有一名生物处于流血状态，此生物恢复10%的最大生命值。

languages.text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に、この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}に苦しめられている生物の数に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}への{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。この生物はまた、出血に苦しんでいる生物の数1匹につき最大の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の+10%をとり戻す。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the number of creatures suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of creatures suffering from bleeding.

traits.locale_text: 各ターン開始時に、この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}効果{/g}に苦しめられている生物の数に等しいボーナスを{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}に与えられる。この生物はまた、出血に苦しんでいる生物の数1体につき最大の傷の＋10％をとり戻す。

languages.text: Al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} igual al número de criaturas que sufren de un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}. La criatura también recupera un 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas por cada criatura que sufre de hemorragia.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the number of creatures suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of creatures suffering from bleeding.

traits.locale_text: Al principio de cada turno, esta criatura gana una bonificación a la {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} igual al número de criaturas que sufren de un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}. La criatura también recupera un 10 % de sus heridas máximas por cada criatura que sufre de hemorragia.

languages.text: Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} erhält diese Kreatur einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} entsprechend der Anzahl der unter dem {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutungs{/g}-Effekt leidenden Kreaturen. Diese Kreatur erhält außerdem +10 % ihrer maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} pro unter Blutung leidender Kreatur zurück.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the number of creatures suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of creatures suffering from bleeding.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn jedes Zuges erhält diese Kreatur einen Bonus auf {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} entsprechend der Anzahl der unter dem {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutungs{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}Effekt{/g} leidenden Kreaturen. Diese Kreatur erhält außerdem +10 % ihrer maximalen Wunden pro unter Blutung leidender Kreatur zurück.

languages.text: Cette créature gagne un bonus de +5 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et de +3 à la Déflexion pour chaque cumul de l'effet.
languages.original_text: This creature gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +3 deflection for each stack of the effect.

traits.locale_text: Au début de chaque tour, cette créature obtient un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} égal au nombre de créatures frappées par l'{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}. Elle récupère également +10 % de sa réserve de blessures maximum par nombre de créatures frappées par l'effet Saignement.

languages.text: Gives a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to deflection per stack of this buff.

traits.locale_text: Gives a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to deflection per stack of this buff.
